name: Words Finder Wordfeud Español/Spanish - find the best words for Wordfeud, crossword and cryptogram
name_original: Words Finder Wordfeud Español/Spanish - find the best words for Wordfeud, crossword and cryptogram
description:
Find words for playing the game, or learn words you never knew. Sort the results on score, word length or alphabet. Find not the longest, but the best word! You can find words using the letters you have, but also match up letters and word parts on the board.

Lookup words online or in the local dictionary with a Copy/Define/Lookup/Mail/Tweet menu.

The word length selector is handy to find words for Draw Something.

You can test if a word exists, and find words with missing letters. You can use this to see if there are words that would fit a game situation, and which letters you would need. Also handy to find 2-letter combinations. Use a single dot for one missing letter, an @ sign for more. Also usable for crossword puzzles.

Searches are case and diacritic-marks insensitive, type 'cabrio', and 'cabrío' is displayed too.

The letter 'ñ' is a separate letter, it is not matched by a simple 'n'. 
Tiles for 'CH', 'LL' and 'RR' are recognized too, just type them as 'ch', 'll' and 'rr'.

No internet connection is required, this App will still help you when you are travelling, with 770.000 words included.

Has iOS7 user interface if you use iOS7, but still has the old user interface if you use iOS6.
